articles.title: Die Folgen von Trumps Politik des Hasses
articles.image_title: Kombo Wergin Trump Clemens Wergin linkes Fotos: (FILES) In this file photo taken on December 07, 2020 US President Donald Trump looks on during a ceremony presenting the Presidential Medal of Freedom to wrestler Dan Gable in the Oval Office of the White House in Washington, DC. - Donald Trump, after caving to pressure and signing a $900 billion coronavirus relief and stimulus package, faces another potential embarrassment this week in the waning days of his presidency with Congress poised to override his veto of a defense bill. A two-thirds majority vote is needed in the 435-member House of Representatives and the 100-seat Senate, which appear able to strike down a Trump veto for the first time. The House is to vote to override Trump's veto on December 28, 2020 and Democrats are optimistic they have enough Republican support to do so. The Senate will take the matter up on December 29, 2020. (Photo by SAUL LOEB / AFP)
articles.author: Clemens Wergin
